subject: Re: A shipment from order #SSN5928 is on the way
description_text:

friend ordered the same thing as me a day later than I did and his have
already landed in the UK

conversations.body_text: Hi Joshua Whinney,  It has been found that your order will be shipped in two packages. One of them is in transit and is expected to arrive in the next few days. The other was arranged for shipment yesterday. Here is your logistics tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047238967361,SF6047238967398
